meanings.definition: A sturdy boot designed for heavy-duty work.
meanings.sent1: My dad wears his workboots when he fixes things around the house.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker put on his workboots before starting the project.
meanings.sent3: The workboot sat in the corner, waiting for its next adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her workboots were like armor, protecting her feet from harm.
meanings.sent5: The workboot stomped through the mud, leaving a trail of determination behind.

meanings.definition: To wear workboots for protection on the job.
meanings.sent1: I workboot every time I go to the construction site.
meanings.sent2: He workboots whenever he has to handle heavy machinery.
meanings.sent3: She workboots like a pro, making sure her feet are always safe.
meanings.sent4: They workbooted through the day, never once complaining about tired feet.
meanings.sent5: We workboot to keep ourselves safe and secure while working.
